pages.text: Jungle Temples, or Temples for short, are large structures made from $(l:blocks/stone)cobblestone$() and mossy cobblestone. They can be found in $(l:biomes/jungle)jungles$() or $(l:biomes/bamboo_jungle)bamboo jungles$(). In their basement is a treasure $(l:blocks/chest)chest$(), protected by a trap. To avoid the trap, you must disable the triggering tripwire.

Another chest can be found behind the staircase puzzle. The staircase puzzle is a $(l:mechanics/redstone)redstone$() contraption that can either be solved or broken into.$(br2)If you need mossy cobblestone in masses, this is a good way to get it.
